Installation¶

PyPI only¶

Install pyscnet via pypi run:

pip install pyscnet

Install from Github¶

Install pyscnet via github run:

git clone https://github.com/MingBit/PySCNet
mkdir dist | python setup.py sdist
pip install dist/pyscnet-0.0.2.tar.gz
